jobDescription: Join Paragon Legal's Commercial Team Paragon Legal, a premier alternative legal services firm, is currently seeking a commercial attorney to work for a technology client in San Francisco. This position is full-time and requires that the attorney work onsite. This project will last for approximately 3-4 months. We specialize in technology and commercial transactions, corporate, employment and IP for clients such as Facebook, Splunk, Autodesk, and Square. Working either on-site or remotely, our attorneys backfill for in-house counsel on leave, assist with ongoing overflow work and help manage special projects.  To join our Commercial team, the ideal attorney will have the following: 5-10 years experience supporting sales;In-house experience at a technology company;Exceptional academic and law firm credentials;California bar admission;A proactive nature and "can-do" attitude; andA good sense of humor, thirst for new challenges. If this sounds like you, please contact us and we will be in touch. Please indicate on the application form which source you applied through. We look forward to hearing from you! Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.
